detail.description: Lumax Auto Technologies Ltd was incorporated in 1981 and is a part of the D.K. Jain Group of companies. It is engaged in the business of manufacturing and supplying of Automotive Lamps, Plastic Moulded Parts, and Frame Chassis to two, three, and four-wheeler segments [1] It has Partnerships with 7 Global players like Yokowo(Japan), JOPP(Germany), and few others.[2]
